title: we have detected a problem with your installation
body: Do you think maybe you can determine that before I go into game? Before I launch and do champion select? Do you think maybe it's not a problem with the installation? I've played 3 games today. I alt tabbed when the loading screen happened and got a bugsplat. This just cost me another game for no goddamned reason.  There is no problem with the installation.

replies.body:
On the loading screen, the game is trying to load all the assets and make connections to the game server. Alt+tabbing at that time runs the risk of interrupting that process and causing some pretty weird things like bugsplats or disconnections. Firstly, I'd try to stay away from alt+tabbing on the loading screen. 

Since you keep getting that installation error, I'd really suggest using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall and clean uninstall at the same time. That'll make sure that there aren't any damaged or corrupted files left over that are hurting the current install.
Related question - has the bug been patched that caused games to crash on the loading screen if the client was in full screen?  It was the first thing that came to mind when I read this post

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zNBaaFmy,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-05-13T01:40:56.998+0000)
> Since you keep getting that installation error, I'd really suggest using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall and clean uninstall at the same time. That'll make sure that there aren't any damaged or corrupted files left over that are hurting the current install.

Is this different in some way from the repair tool that ran when the game detected an unrecoverable problem?

The client isn't loading the game assets during champion select, so it won't be able to catch any potential problems that *might* occur once it does start loading everything. The loading screen is just that, when the load actually starts to load. If it tried to load stuff during the client, you'd run into cases where it loads the wrong things after someone changes champions or the client itself gets slowed down because everyone is loading the game files while trying to choose champions and interact with each other. Alt tabbing *may* also interrupt the loading screen, but it doesn't happen every time. It's a little hiccup that can happen with anything while bridging connections.

Uninstalling and reinstalling is a bit different from the client repairs in the sense that the repair is scanning for damaged or missing files, while the repair is doing a clean sweep of everything to make sure it hits any possible oddities.
